title: Donna Braselle leaves CNN after the leak, the illusion detection campaign.
subtitle: CNN broke up with the political commentator Donna Brasel after leaking e-mails that showed what seemed to be inappropriate collusion with Hillary Clinton's campaign.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Donna Brasel was expelled from CNN after leaked e-mails suggesting that she had used her website to transmit information to the Clinton campaign about future manifestations.
